document_data.name: Godfrey
document_data.mainbody: '''Godfrey''' was a warrior who lived in [[Pros]] and fought for the [[Dragon Cult]] that had taken power in the town during the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Personality: He was a burly and confident man who was quite aggressive in his dealings with non-cultists.
document_data.Possessions: Along with his fellow warriors, Godfrey wore a [[steel]] [[breastplate]] and the black cap with the image of a [[dragon]] that was so closely associated with their group.
document_data.Activities: He and his associates would extort [[silver]] from vessels that attempted to moor their boats in Pros, demanding a "harbor tax" from every individual.
document_data.Relationships: Godfrey was one of the Black Caps the cult employed as enforcers, alongside his fellow [[Henry (Pros)|Henry]].
document_data.History: The over-confident warrior was slain in the {{YearlinkName|1364}} by [[Vaerana Hawklyn]], when he attempted to strong arm her [[Harper]] associate [[Ruha]].
